lead_paragraph: An article in some editions on Tuesday about the Mets’ 6-5 loss to the Diamondbacks referred incorrectly to a statistic for Arizona pitcher Dan Haren. He has received six runs of support in games since 2006; this was not the first time he had received such run support since that season.
